  • Constructor Details

    • AbstractFighter

      public AbstractFighter(float x, float y, int width, int height, String fighterName)

    • AbstractFighter

      public AbstractFighter(float x, float y, int width, int height, String fighterName, int offsetX, int offsetY)
      Parameters:
      x - horizontal index position (in game units)
      y - vertical index position (in game units)
      width - width of the sprite
      height - height of the sprite
      fighterName - String name of the sprite-sheet of this character
      offsetX - will be reduced from the width of the sprite (if the sprite has blank surrounding space)
      offsetY - will be reduced from the height of the sprite (if the sprite has blank surrounding space)

    • AbstractFighter
